column5: My last walleye of 2021 was a beast 12.9 lbs Have a good new year everyone .
Imagine the fillet off that one.   	great fish congrats.
Nice score Steve. Happy New Year.
solid finish. how long was that fish?
I think she’s been eating Muskies. What a belly on it.
Steve, you still have the magic touch on the Niagara...what a magnificent walleye...congrats!
Did it fight or just feel like a log?

I catch a lot of bass in the lower niagara river. I'd love to catch a few walleyes. Any tips on what you use  and the average depth you fish would be appreciated. I drift for bass using a carolina rig 15 to 25 feet and in the fall fish the mouth of the river tossing crankbaits and such. There are some bruts in there
Hair jig, jigging spoons, swim baits. Same drifts as the bows and bass
Thanks for the reply......That is one beautiful walleye....
Very Nice! Have a wonderful year!
